name: Unsung Kingdom
description:
Introduction

The King is Dead.
The Glory of the past can no longer be seen beyond the closed Gates of the Castle.
The Kingdom came to an end with the Death of the Great King.
- The History of Bellion

This is the Story of the once glorious Kingdom of Bellion.
Ann, a time traveler from the future, fights to save the King from his fate to die.

System

Short story RPG, with a simple and fast turn-based combat system.

Contribute to the English version

There's currently no English translation.
I would be grateful if you could become a Contributor to the translation. Please contact to me.
